name: Baby First Birthday Party - New baby birthday planner game
name_original: Baby First Birthday Party - New baby birthday planner game
description:
It’s been a year since mommy Emma had a newborn baby and now it is finally time to have birthday celebrations for the new baby’s first birthday. Put on the birthday hat, and have an amazing time in Baby First Birthday Party.

Like every sweet baby birthday party, the first birthday party also requires some professional party planning and some birthday party idea. As an expert party planner, it’s your job to take care of the birthday cake, dress up. This is the coolest way for kids to be the best baby birthday party planner. Baby First Birthday Party is full of crazy fun and creative party activities for sweet baby girl and boy.
